articles.title: We are back! August classes and our Friday social news! üíÜüíÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
articles.author: Alyssa, High Wycombe
articles.short: Recharged, and full of energy, we are ready to resume our High Wycombe classes for Salsa and Bachata, this week (20th and 21st of August). Also, don't miss out on our FREE social this friday! Are you ready? (...)
articles.text:
Recharged, and full of energy, we are ready to resume our High Wycombe classes for Salsa and Bachata, this week (20th and 21st of August). Also, don't miss out on our FREE social this friday! Are you ready?

Here is the weekly schedule: 

Salsa Tuesdays (starting 20th of August):
Beginners: 7:00 PM ‚Äì Jump into the lively atmosphere of salsa with our beginner sessions. No experience? No worries! Our professional instructors will walk you through the foundational steps, rhythms, and the pure enjoyment of salsa dancing.
Improvers: 8:00 PM ‚Äì Ready to add some flair to your salsa routines? Our improvers' level is designed for those who are comfortable with the basics and crave more challenging combinations and techniques.

Bachata Wednesdays (starting 21st of August):
Beginners: 7:00 PM ‚Äì Embrace the sensual rhythms of bachata in our beginner classes. Starting from scratch, we ensure a comfortable and joyful learning experience, guiding you through every movement.
Improvers: 8:00 PM ‚Äì Enhance your bachata with our improver sessions. We focus on more intricate steps and rhythms, allowing your dance to truly shine.

Why Sign Up?
Beginner-Friendly: Our classes are structured to welcome everyone, helping each individual discover their rhythm and gain confidence on the dance floor.
Adults Exclusive: We offer a mature and supportive environment where adults can freely learn, practice, and revel in the spirit of Latin dance.
Expert Instruction: Led by enthusiastic and experienced dance instructors, our team is dedicated to offering personalized coaching to nurture your growth.
Community Spirit: Become part of a community that shares your enthusiasm for dance and culture. Our courses are not just about mastering steps but about forming lasting friendships and unforgettable moments.
Location: Situated in the heart of High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire, our dance academy offers a spacious and welcoming venue for all our activities.

Let‚Äôs Dance!
Seize the moment this August! Places are quickly being reserved for our sessions. Whether you‚Äôre in search of a new hobby, a fun way to keep fit, or a deep dive into the enthralling realm of Latin dance, our Salsa and Bachata classes are your ticket to an invigorating adventure.

Register now and let‚Äôs fill your life with the energy and rhythm of Latin dance this August. We can‚Äôt wait to see you on the dance floor!

articles.title: Get Ready to Sway This May: Join Our Bachata and Salsa Dance Courses!
articles.author: Alyssa, High Wycombe
articles.short: High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire ‚Äì This May, our Latin dance school in High Wycombe restarts our beginners Bachata and Salsa dance courses on 7th and 8th of May, 2024! (...)
articles.text:
High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire ‚Äì This May, our Latin dance school in High Wycombe restarts our beginners Bachata and Salsa dance courses on 7th and 8th of May, 2024! Whether you're stepping onto the dance floor for the first time or looking to refine your moves, we have the perfect rhythm and steps waiting for you.

Our dance floor is set to welcome adults with or without prior dance experience. We believe in the joy and passion that Latin dance brings into lives and are dedicated to making this an inclusive, vibrant, and unforgettable experience for everyone.

Salsa Tuesdays:
Beginners: 7:00 PM ‚Äì Dive into the world of salsa with our beginner-friendly sessions. No prior experience? No problem! Our expert instructors will guide you through the basic steps, rhythms, and the sheer joy of salsa dancing.
Improvers: 8:00 PM ‚Äì For those who have mastered the basics and are looking to spice up their salsa skills, our improvers' level will challenge and excite you with more complex sequences and techniques.

Bachata Wednesdays:
Beginners: 7:00 PM ‚Äì Bachata, known for its romantic melodies and smooth moves, is perfect for beginners. Our classes are designed to start from the ground up, ensuring you feel confident and joyful with every step.
Improvers: 8:00 PM ‚Äì Elevate your bachata with our improver sessions. We'll delve deeper into the dance, introducing more nuanced moves and rhythms that will truly make your dance stand out.

Why Join Us?
No Prior Experience Necessary: Our courses are tailored to ensure that everyone, regardless of their dance background, finds their rhythm and confidence on the dance floor.
Adults Only: We've created a mature and welcoming environment where adults can comfortably learn, practice, and enjoy the essence of Latin dance.
Expert Instructors: Our team of skilled instructors is passionate about Latin dance and dedicated to providing personalized guidance to help you flourish.
Vibrant Community: Join a group of like-minded individuals who share your passion for dance and culture. Our classes are more than just learning steps; they're about building connections and creating memorable experiences.

Location: Our dance school is conveniently located in High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire, offering a spacious and inviting setting for all our classes.

Ready to Dance? 
Don't let this opportunity pass you by! Spots are filling up quickly for our February sessions. Whether you're seeking a new hobby, a way to stay active, or simply to immerse yourself in the captivating world of Latin dance, our Bachata and Salsa courses are your gateway to an exhilarating journey.

Sign up today and let's bring the warmth and rhythm of Latin dance into your life this February. See you on the dance floor!

We're delighted to be welcomed at the Mad Squirrel in High Wycombe! Buy a pint and be treated to FREE DANCE CLASSES!

FRIDAY 26th April, 2024

Venue:
Mad Squirrel High Wycombe
4-5 Church Street HP11 2DE High Wycombe, UK

articles.title: Elevate Your Salsa with Gil Prado Mendez at Our Exclusive Workshop!
articles.author: Martin, High Wycombe
articles.short: Get ready to spin, shine, and elevate your Salsa skills to new heights! We're thrilled to announce an exclusive opportunity for dance enthusiasts and aspiring Salsa stars: a special Salsa Spinning and Technique Workshop featuring the UK's most sought-after instructor, Gil Prado Mendez. Mark your calendars for April 20th, 2024, and join us at the Wycombe Community Arts Centre for a masterclass that promises to transform your dance floor prowess. (...)
articles.text:
Get ready to spin, shine, and elevate your Salsa skills to new heights! We're thrilled to announce an exclusive opportunity for dance enthusiasts and aspiring Salsa stars: a special Salsa Spinning and Technique Workshop featuring the UK's most sought-after instructor, Gil Prado Mendez. Mark your calendars for April 20th, 2024, and join us at the Wycombe Community Arts Centre for a masterclass that promises to transform your dance floor prowess.

Master the Art of Salsa with an International Sensation
Gil Prado Mendez is not just any instructor; he's a celebrated figure in the world of Latin dance, known internationally for his inventive turn patterns, captivating shines, and, most importantly, his meticulous attention to technique. Gil brings humor and energy to every lesson, making complex moves accessible to all levels of dancers. Alongside his partner, Anke Obermayer of the Pexava Dance Company, Gil has dazzled audiences and judges alike, representing Mexico and Austria in the most prestigious national and international dance competitions.

Workshop Details You Need to Know
When: April 20th, 2024
Where: Wycombe Community Arts Centre, Desborough Rd, High Wycombe HP11 2PU
Time: 2PM - 4PM
Price: ¬£25.00 per person

This two-hour workshop is designed not just to teach but to inspire, offering insights into the techniques that make a world-class Salsa performer. Whether you're looking to improve your spinning, enhance your styling, or simply add new patterns to your repertoire, Gil's workshop is an unmissable event.

Limited Spots for an Intimate Learning Experience
To ensure each participant receives personalized attention, spots in this workshop are highly limited. This is your chance to learn from a master of Salsa in an intimate setting, where every question is answered and every spin is perfected.

Secure Your Place on the Dance Floor
Don't miss this unique opportunity to learn from one of the best in the business. Whether you're a seasoned Salsa dancer or just beginning to explore the rhythm and passion of Latin dance, Gil's workshop will leave you inspired, energized, and ready to take on the dance floor with newfound confidence and skill.

Visit https://bit.ly/SalsaSpinningandTechniqueWorkshop to purchase a ticket or get in touch via email latin_shine@outlook.com to reserve your spot now and get ready to spin your way to Salsa success with Gil Prado Mendez!

articles.title: Discover the Joy of Dance This April: Join Our Salsa and Bachata Classes!
articles.author: Alyssa, High Wycombe
articles.short: Are you looking to add a spark of joy and a splash of rhythm to your life? This April, we're rolling out the red carpet for all dance enthusiasts, beginners, and seasoned movers to join our vibrant Salsa and Bachata dance courses. Whether you're aiming to break free from the monotony of daily routines, meet new people, or simply find a fun way to stay fit, our dance floor is open to everyone! (...)
articles.text:
Are you looking to add a spark of joy and a splash of rhythm to your life? This April, we're rolling out the red carpet for all dance enthusiasts, beginners, and seasoned movers to join our vibrant Salsa and Bachata dance courses. Whether you're aiming to break free from the monotony of daily routines, meet new people, or simply find a fun way to stay fit, our dance floor is open to everyone!

Why Dance With Us?
Dancing isn't just about the steps or the music; it's about transforming your lifestyle, boosting your well-being, and discovering a new mode of expression. Our dance classes are more than just lessons; they're a gateway to a world filled with passion, excitement, and rhythm.

Salsa: Starting April 2nd
Dive into the lively, energetic world of Salsa every Tuesday night! Perfect for those who love a bit of flair and energy in their dance, Salsa will not only improve your fitness levels but also boost your confidence on and off the dance floor.

Bachata: Beginning April 3rd
Embrace the sensual, romantic rhythms of Bachata every Tuesday evening. This dance is all about connection, grace, and expressing emotion through movement. It's an excellent way to unwind after a long day and add some romance to your exercise routine.

What You'll Gain
- A Fun, Innovative Workout: Forget boring gym routines; dance your way to fitness with our engaging classes. 

- A Supportive Community: Join a group of like-minded individuals who share your passion for dance and excitement for life. 

- Confidence: Discover new levels of self-assurance as you master each move. 

No Experience? No Problem!
Our courses are designed to welcome dancers of all levels, including absolute beginners. With our experienced instructors, you'll be guided every step of the way, ensuring you feel comfortable, confident, and ready to dance your heart out.

articles.title: üéâüíÉ November 3-week Beginner Dance Courses! üíÉüéâ
articles.author: Alyssa, High Wycombe
articles.short: November marks your last chance to join our electrifying dance classes for the year before we take a short break. We'll be back on January 9th and 10th to kick off the new year with a bang! (...)
articles.text:
November marks your last chance to join our electrifying dance classes for the year before we take a short break. We'll be back on January 9th and 10th to kick off the new year with a bang! 

 Why Choose Us?
üï∫ Dance Your Way to Fitness: Are you looking to stay active and fit while having a blast? Look no further! Our Latin dance classes combine fitness and fun like no other. You'll be burning calories and breaking a sweat while grooving to infectious rhythms.
üéâ Learn from the Best: Our passionate and experienced instructors will guide you through every step, making sure you feel confident on the dance floor in no time. Whether you're a complete beginner or have some dance experience, we've got you covered.
üìÖ Last Chance for 2023: Don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity to join our classes this year. November is your final chance! After a short break, we'll be back on January 9th and 10th, so mark your calendars.Class Schedule:
üïó November Schedule:
* Salsa Beginners dates: 31st October, 7th November, 14th November
* Bachata Beginners dates: 1st November, 8th November, 15th November
üóìÔ∏è Save the Date:
* We'll be on break from 16th November to January 8th.
* Classes resume on 9th and 10th January, 2024.

Why Latin Dance?
Discover the magic of Latin dance, where every step is an adventure and every move is a work of art. Whether you're looking to impress on the dance floor or simply want to unwind and enjoy the rhythm of life, our classes have something for everyone.
Join Us Today!Don't let this opportunity slip away! Reserve your spot now and be part of our exciting Latin dance community. Limited spots available for November, so secure your place today. Get ready to dance, stay fit, and have the time of your life!

Contact Us:
Got questions? Need more information? Feel free to reach out to us. We're here to help you embark on your dance journey!

latin_shine@outlook.com

articles.title: üéâüíÉ NEW October Beginner Dance Courses: Unleash Your Inner Rhythm with Latin Shine Dance Company! üíÉüéâ
articles.author: Alyssa, High Wycombe
articles.short: Exciting news, dance enthusiasts! High Wycombe's favorite Latin dance hub, Latin Shine Dance Company, is kickstarting a fresh and vibrant batch of Bachata and Salsa classes this October. (...)
articles.text:
Exciting news, dance enthusiasts! High Wycombe's favorite Latin dance hub, Latin Shine Dance Company, is kickstarting a fresh and vibrant batch of Bachata and Salsa classes this October. üåü Take your first step into the world of Latin dance with Latin Shine Dance Company üåü

üìÖ When?
Mark your calendars ‚Äì our fiery dance sessions ignite on the 3rd and 4th of October.

üëü Who's it for?
Everyone! Beginners, don/'t be shy. This course is tailored to make you fall in love with the beats of Bachata and Salsa. And guess what? No dance partner? No worries! You don‚Äôt need one to join in on the fun.

üìç Where?In the heart of High Wycombe. Dive into an environment that's fun, friendly, and full of energy! Check location details for our Guildhall & Castle Street Dance Studio

üí° Tip: Our classes tend to fill up fast, especially with the buzz of a new course. Secure your spot now and immerse yourself in the world of Latin dance.

Ready to dance, laugh, and shine? Join Latin Shine Dance Company this October. Because life's better when you dance! üíÉüï∫

articles.short: üíÉüï∫Interested in trying something new in October? üíÉüï∫ Come learn Sensual Bachata which includes basic steps, dancing technique and shines and body movement in High Wycombe! (...)
articles.text: üíÉüï∫Interested in trying something new in October? üíÉüï∫ Come learn Sensual Bachata which includes basic steps, dancing technique and shines and body movement in High Wycombe! Our new complete beginner`s course starts this Wednesday! (4 Week course) üïñ Time:7PM (beginners) üìÜ Date: 5th of October, 2022 (every Wednesday) üì£Price: ¬£10 or ¬£7 for students üîπ Venue: Guildhall (1st floor), HighStreet, High Wycombe ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Details: https://fb.me/e/208mrMMqg No partner or prior dancing experience is necessary. Our Latin Shine community is growing every week ‚ù§Ô∏è Come meet new people and have fun learning something new!

articles.text: We are teaching Bachata Sensual classes at the High Wycombe Guildhall (High Street). Classes are taught by two of our instructors Alyssa and Martin to represent Sensual Style dynamics of followers and leaders.
